page.title: 10Kirkton Farm
page.content: The original Kirkton Farm is now Mrs.Millar's house. The present farm house is near to{Bannatyne House.}Mr. Lindsay is the tenant farmer. He has two farms,{Kirkton}and {Pitnappie.}He has 343 acres of land.His principal source of income is cattle and sheep.He has 115 cattle, including a bull,and 101 sheep (ewes and lambs). He doesn't buy animals he breeds them. He sells at the market in Perth. He has a sheep dog called Tink to help with the sheep. He grows potatoes and oats as cash crops and turnips and grass for winter feed.Mr.Lindsay's main crop is fruit. He has about 25 acres of raspberries and 15 acres of strawberries. (Derek MacKenzie P.7)
